title: Error 0xc000005 started 27/07/2017
body: Every time I try to start a game after champ select it says that LoL has stopped working and error 0xc000005 has occurred. If I completely restart my computer then I get put into the game but I don't want to have to do that every time I start a game. I have tried to do all the shit with anti-virus and uninstalled / reinstalled league. please help.

replies.body: This sounds like some of your game files might have been corrupted or damaged somehow. Let's clean those up really quick by grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure you get a full working install of the game.
